verse.title: WhenGoingToTheMosque1
verse.text: {ll~ahum~a {joEalo fiy qalobiy nuwrFA\, wafiy lisaAniy nuwrFA\, wafiy samoEiy nuwrFA\, wafiy baSariy nuwrFA\, wamino fawoqiy nuwrFA\, wamin taHotiy nuwrFA\, waEan yamiyniy nuwrFA\, waEano $imaAliy nuwrFA\, wamino >amaAmiy nuwrFA\, wamino xalofiy nuwrFA\, waAjoEalo fiy nafosiy nuwrFA\, wa>aEoZimo liy nuwrFA\, waEaZ~imo liy nuwrFA\, waAjoEalo liy nuwrFA\, waAjoEaloniy nuwrFA\, {ll~ahum~a >aEoTiniy nuwrFA\, waAjoEalo fiy EaSabiy nuwrFA\, wafiy laHomiy nuwrFA\, wafiy damiy nuwrFA\, wafiy $aEoriy nuwrFA\, wafiy ba$ariy nuwrFA ({ll~ahum~a {joEalo liy nuwrFA fiy qaboriy\. wanuwrFA fiy EiZaAmiy) (wazidoniy nuwrFA\, wazidoniy nuwrFA\, wazidoniy nuwrFA) (wahabo liy nuwrFA EalaY nuwrK) \{Al-Bukhari 11/116 (Hadith no. 6316) and by Muslim 1/526,529-530 (Hadith no. 763). Al-Tirmidhi 5/483 (Hadith no. 3419). Al-Bukhari in Al-Adab Al-Mufrad (Hadith no. 695), p. 258. See also Al-Albani, Sahih Al-Adab Al-Mufrad (no. 536), Al-Bukhari, cf. Al-Asqalani, Fathul-Bari 11/118.\}
